inputQueryDetails.query:
select 
    l.LOAN_ID,
    l.ACCOUNT_ID,
    a.CLIENT_ID,
    c.FULL_NAME,
    format('%1$tB %1$te, %1$tY', "l"."DATE" ) as DATE_,
    l.AMOUNT,
    l.DURATION,
    l.STATUS
from BANKING_AND_CREDIT_CARDS_LOAN_DETAILS.LOAN l
inner join BANKING_AND_CREDIT_CARDS_LOAN_DETAILS.ACCOUNT a on a.ACCOUNT_ID = l.ACCOUNT_ID and a.CLIENT_ID = 123
inner join BANKING_AND_CREDIT_CARDS_LOAN_DETAILS.CLIENT c on a.CLIENT_ID = c.CLIENT_ID
where 1=1
and l.LOAN_ID = 123
and any_match(regexp_split ('123',',') , x -> try_cast(x as INTEGER) = l.ACCOUNT_ID ) = true
order by 3,2
